Fishing Guild Member:
Equipment plays a big part in fishing. It's significance shouldn't be underestimated. Warriors preparing for the battle choose most enduring swords and shields to overcome the enemy for sure. We, fishermen, do the same. We choose a firmer fishing rod to get a rich take.
A clever fisherman always tries to get good equipment. A Master Fishing Rod is the best choice!
The Fishing Guild wants as many fishermen as possible to learn about this fishing rod and get it. Well, are you interested?
